original_title: Barney: Happy, Mad, Silly, Sad: Putting a Face to Feeling
overview: Barney encourages kids to express their emotions in a positive way -- through songs, games and honest conversation. From good manners to showing compassion, Barney and his friends demonstrate healthy interaction between friends and family.
title: Barney: Happy, Mad, Silly, Sad: Putting a Face to Feeling
